tavparsadswaiyeEnglish.English: Tav Parsaad Svayae
<font color='#FFA500'>ik oankaar</font> sat gur Prasaad
Paat.shaahee 10.
Sraavag sudh smooh sidhaan <font color='#FFA500'>kae</font> daekh phireo ghar jog jatee kae
Soor suraardan sudh <font color='#FFA500'>sudhadik</font> sant smooh anaek matee kae
Saarae hee daes ko daekh raheau <font color='#FFA500'>matt</font> kaoo naa daekheeat Praan Patee kae
Sree Bhagvaan kee bhaae kripaa hoo <font color='#FFA500'>tae</font> aek ratee binu aek ratee kae
Maatae matang jarae jar <font color='#FFA500'>sang</font> anoop outang surang svaarae
Kot trang kurang sae <font color='#FFA500'>koodat</font> poun kae goun ko jaat nivaarae
Bhaaree bhujaan kae bhoop bhalee <font color='#FFA500'>bidhe</font> niaavat sees naa jaat bichaarae
Aetae bhae tu khaa bhae <font color='#FFA500'>bhoopate ant</font> kaou naangae hee paane padhaarae
Jeet phiraae sabh daes dissan <font color='#FFA500'>ko</font> baajat dhol mridang nagaarae
Gunjat <font color='#009900'>goor</font> gajaan kae <font color='#FFA500'>sundar</font> hinsat hee hyraaj hajaarae
Bhoot bhavikkh bhvaan kae <font color='#FFA500'>bhoopat</font> koun ganaae naheen jaat bichaarae
Sreepate Sree Bhagwan bhajae <font color='#FFA500'>binnu</font> ant kou ant kae dhaam sidhaarae
Tirath naan deaa damm <font color='#FFA500'>daan</font> su sanjamm naem anaek bisaekhaae
Baed Puraan Kataeb <font color='#FFA500'>Kuraan</font> zameen zamaan sabaan kae paekhaae
Poun ahaar jatee jatt <font color='#FFA500'>dhaar</font> sabaae su bichaar hajaar ka daekhaae
Sree Bhagvaan bhajae binu <font color='#FFA500'>bhoopate  aek ratee binu aek naa laekhaaae
Sudh sipaah durant <font color='#FFA500'>dubaah</font> su saaje snaah durjaan dalaaengae
Bhaaree gumaan bharae mann <font color='#FFA500'>maaen</font> karr parbat pankh <font color='#009900'>halae</font> naa halaaengae
Tore areen marore <font color='#FFA500'>mavasan</font> maatae matangane maan malaaengae
Sree Pate Sree Bhagvaan kripaa <font color='#FFA500'>binu</font> tiaage jahaan nidaan chalaaengae
Beer apaar badae <font color='#FFA500'>bareaar</font> abchaarhe saar kee dhaar bhachhayaa
Torat daes malind <font color='#FFA500'>mavaasan</font> maatae gajaan kae maan malayaa
Garhae garhaan kae <font color='#FFA500'>toranhaar</font> su baatan heen chakk chaar lavayaa
Saahibu Saree sabh ko <font color='#FFA500'>sirnaaik</font> jachak anaek su aek divayaa
Daanav daev phanind <font color='#FFA500'>nisaachar</font> bhoot bhavikh bhawaan japaaengae
Jeev jitae jall maae thall <font color='#FFA500'>maae</font> pall hee pall maae sabh thaap thapaaengae
Punn partaapan baadh jaaet <font color='#FFA500'>dhunn</font> papan kae bahu punj khapaaengae
Saadh smooh prasann phiraae <font color='#FFA500'>jagg</font> satr sabhaae avlok chapaaengae
Maanav Indr gajindr <font color='#FFA500'>naraadhap</font> jaoun trilok ko raaj karaaengae
Kote isnaan gajaadik <font color='#FFA500'>daan</font> anaek suanbar saaj baraaengae
Brahm Mahaesar Bisan <font color='#FFA500'>Sacheepate</font> ant phasae jamm phaas praaengae
Jae narr Sree Patte kae prass haaen <font color='#FFA500'>pagg</font> tae narr phaer naa daeh dharaaengae
Kahaa bhayo jo dooo lochan moond <font color='#FFA500'>kaae</font> baaethe raheo bakk dhiaan lagaaeo
Nhaat phirio leeae saat <font color='#FFA500'>samudrne</font> lok gayo parlok gavaaeo
bass keeo bikhiaan so baaeth <font color='#FFA500'>kaae</font> aaesae hee aaesae su baaes bitaaeo
Saach kahon sunn laehu <font color='#FFA500'>sabhaae</font> jinn praem keeo tin hee Prabh paaeo
Kaahoo laae pahan pooj dhareo <font color='#FFA500'>sir</font kahoo laae ling garae latkaaeo
Kahoo lakheo Hare avaachee dissaa <font color='#FFA500'>mahe</font> kaahoo pachhah ko seesu nivaaeo
Kooo butaan ko poojat haae <font color='#FFA500'>passu</font> kooo mritaan ko poojan dhaaeo
Koor kriaa ourjheo sabh hee <font color='#FFA500'>jagg</font> Sree Bhagvaan kaa bhaed naa paaeo
Kooo butaan ko poojat haae <font color='#FFA500'>passu</font> kooo mritaan ko poojan dhaaeo
Koor kriaa ourjheo sabh hee <font color='#FFA500'>jagg</font> Sree Bhagvaan kaa bhaed naa paaeo
